component.name: H_{info}
component.description: hierarchical structure of information to disclose

component.name: score_{rel}
component.description: relevance scoring function for each node

property.name: Monotonic Disclosure
property.formal-spec: $\forall t_1, t_2 : t_1 < t_2 \implies \text{Revealed}_{t_1} \subseteq \text{Revealed}_{t_2}$ (never hide revealed info)

property.name: Relevance-Based Ordering
property.formal-spec: $\forall n_1, n_2 : score_{rel}(n_1) > score_{rel}(n_2) \implies t_{reveal}(n_1) \leq t_{reveal}(n_2)$ (high relevance first)

property.name: Parent-Before-Children
property.formal-spec: $\forall n, c : c \in \text{children}(n) \implies t_{reveal}(n) < t_{reveal}(c)$ (hierarchical order)

operation.name: Score Relevance
operation.formal-definition: $\text{score}(n, ctx) = w_1 \cdot \text{sim}(n.content, ctx.query)$ $+ w_2 \cdot n.importance$ $+ w_3 \cdot \text{novelty}(n, \text{Revealed}_t)$ where $w_1 + w_2 + w_3 = 1$

operation.name: Next To Reveal
operation.formal-definition: $\text{next}(H, R) = \arg\max_{n \in H \setminus R} \text{score}(n, ctx)$ subject to: $\text{parent}(n) \in R$ (parent revealed)
